title: Mathematical Set Operations
description: Master union, intersection, difference, symmetric difference, subset, superset, and disjoint operations with Python sets.

solution:
# Function 1: Union of two sets
def union_sets(set_a, set_b):
    """Return union (all elements from both sets).
    
    Args:
        set_a (set): First set
        set_b (set): Second set
    
    Returns:
        set: Union of both sets
    """
    return set_a | set_b

# Function 2: Intersection of two sets
def intersection_sets(set_a, set_b):
    """Return intersection (common elements).
    
    Args:
        set_a (set): First set
        set_b (set): Second set
    
    Returns:
        set: Elements in both sets
    """
    return set_a & set_b

# Function 3: Difference between sets
def difference_sets(set_a, set_b):
    """Return elements in set_a but not in set_b.
    
    Args:
        set_a (set): First set
        set_b (set): Second set
    
    Returns:
        set: Elements only in set_a
    """
    return set_a - set_b

# Function 4: Symmetric difference
def symmetric_difference_sets(set_a, set_b):
    """Return elements in either set but not both.
    
    Args:
        set_a (set): First set
        set_b (set): Second set
    
    Returns:
        set: Elements in exactly one set
    """
    return set_a ^ set_b

# Function 5: Check if subset
def is_subset(set_a, set_b):
    """Check if set_a is subset of set_b.
    
    Args:
        set_a (set): Potential subset
        set_b (set): Potential superset
    
    Returns:
        bool: True if set_a ⊆ set_b
    """
    return set_a <= set_b

# Function 6: Check if disjoint
def is_disjoint(set_a, set_b):
    """Check if sets have no elements in common.
    
    Args:
        set_a (set): First set
        set_b (set): Second set
    
    Returns:
        bool: True if no common elements
    """
    return set_a.isdisjoint(set_b)
hints: Symmetric difference: use ^ operator or .symmetric_difference() method
Subset check: use <= operator or .issubset() method
Disjoint: use .isdisjoint() method - returns True if no common elements
